column2: SVMK, Inc. engages in the provision of survey software products. The company is headquartered in San Mateo, California and currently employs 857 full-time employees. Its software platform enables organizations to engage with their key constituents, including their customers, employees and the markets they serve. Its people powered data platform enables conversations at scale to deliver customer, employee and market insights. The Companyâ€™s platform uses a combination of survey science, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to collect and analyze people powered data. The firm provides its broad survey platform available in a variety of ways, depending on the needs of the users. The company offers individuals with basic survey plan at no charge. The company also offer multiple tiers of subscriptions to individual paying users which provide additional features and functionality, and for organizations it offers an enterprise-grade version of our survey platform with enhanced collaboration, integration, administration and customization tools.
